thread.title: Robber dies after fellow robber accidentally shoots him
thread.title_full: Robber dies after fellow robber accidentally shoots him | News24

author: news24.com
title: Robber dies after fellow robber accidentally shoots him
text:
Johannesburg - A suspected robber has died after he was accidentally shot by his alleged partner in crime, Gauteng police said on Monday.
The incident occurred in Hillbrow.
Spokesperson Major General JT Pharasi told News24 the two were allegedly robbing a business in the area when one apparently shot the other.
"One of the suspects mistakenly shot the other suspect. The [shot] suspect passed away," he said.
